page.title: 13EDUCATION SYSTEM OF PEEBLES
page.content: A range of establishments cater for all age groups.{3 Creche Units}staffed mainly by volunteers with early play activities but no formal teaching. 28 f/t teachers + p/t & aux provide a wide range of learning situations for some 625 pupils aged 4-12 in{3 Primary Schools while the{High School}staff of 68 provide a general education for the 985 pupils aged 12-16(compulsory) and 16-18(optional).Barnardo's {Craigerne {School}is fully residential for the 26 boys whose circumstances require spcl. education from 5 f/t & 3 p/t teachers. {Victoria Park Day Centre}for 30 mental phys h/cap 7 staff encourage self-sufficiency through Homecraft. {Night Classes }with mainly vocational subjects eg.auto maint,pottery; are available to the general public,range from Â£1ntly yoga to Â£15 for a 26 week course in English (exam Â£6 extra).
